name: I love you Folded Book Art
description:
This unwanted book has been given new life, by lovingly and painstakingly being folded to make this beautiful sculpture.

No page was harmed in the making! - there is absolutely no cutting! only folding.... if you wanted you could unfold the pages, and have a good read. Good luck putting it back though :)

This will make a great piece on any bookshelf, or coffee table. Sure to grab peoples attention!
A beautiful, romantic gift.

Made from:
Please note, these books have an 'aged' look to them as they are old books, but that is part of their charm.

There may be minor wear, marks, stains or age spots on the book due to age and having had a previous life!

Dimensions:
The book stands approximately 20cm high.

name: Teal Small Heart Folded Book Art
description:
This unwanted book has been given new life, by lovingly and painstakingly being folded to make this beautiful sculpture.

No page was harmed in the making! There is absolutely no cutting, only folding. If you wanted, you could untie the neat little ribbon, unfold the pages, and have a good read. Good luck putting it back though!

This will make a great piece on any bookshelf, or coffee table. Sure to grab peoples attention! A beautiful, romantic gift.

The two books underneath show the colour and style of the cover. Titles will vary. You will only receive the one book sculpture.

Made from:
These books are from the Companion Book Club series and are in a mock leather binding.

Please note, the books have an 'aged' look to them as they are old books, but that is part of their charm. The book is beautifully tied with a satin ribbon.

There may be minor wear, marks, stains or age spots on the book due to age and having had a previous life!

Dimensions:
The book stands approximately 19cm high.

name: Single Letter Folded Book Art
description:
This unwanted book has been given new life, by lovingly and painstakingly being folded to make this beautiful sculpture.

A lovely gift for a birthday, engagement, wedding or anniversary. A personalised initial beautifully folded in the pages of a book.

No page was harmed in the making! There is absolutely no cutting, only folding. If you wanted you could unfold the pages, and have a good read. Good luck putting it back though!

This will make a great piece on any bookshelf, or coffee table. Sure to grab peoples attention! A beautiful, romantic gift.

Choose the letter you would like.

The book cover will be navy, dark red, green of brown according to availability.

Made from:
Please note, these books have an 'aged' look to them as they are old books, but that is part of their charm.

There may be minor wear, marks, stains or age spots on the book due to age and having had a previous life!

Dimensions:
The book stands approximately 20cm high.

name: Single Digit Folded Book Art
description:
AS SEEN IN BRIDES MAGAZINE Jul/Aug2013

This unwanted book has been given new life, lovingly and painstakingly being folded to make this beautiful sculpture.

A lovely gift for a birthday, engagement, wedding or anniversary. A single number beautifully folded in the pages of a book.

Could be used as wedding table numbers.

No page was harmed in the making! There is absolutely no cutting, only folding. If you wanted you could unfold the pages, and have a good read. Good luck putting it back though!

This will make a great piece on any bookshelf, or coffee table. Sure to grab peoples attention! A beautiful, romantic gift.

Choose the letter you would like.
PLEASE SEND A MESSAGE STATING THE SINGLE NUMBER YOU WOULD LIKE.

Made from:
Please note, these books have an 'aged' look to them as they are old books, but that is part of their charm.

There may be minor wear, marks, stains or age spots on the book due to age and having had a previous life!

Dimensions:
The book stands approximately 20cm high.
